name: Against the Wendigo
text:
Easy / Standard
[skull]: -1. If you fail, lose 1 resource.
[cultist]: -2. If you fail, an [[Ally]] asset you control takes 1 damage and 1 horror.
[tablet]: -2. If you succeed, place 1 clue from the reserve on the Mountain Range. If you fail, take 1 horror.
[elder_thing]: -3. If you fail, take 1 horror.
back_text:
Hard / Expert
[skull]: -2. If you fail, lose 2 resources.
[cultist]: -2. If you fail, remove an [[Ally]] asset you control from the game.
[tablet]: -3. If you succeed, place 1 clue from the reserve on the Mountain Range. If you fail, take 1 horror.
[elder_thing]: -4. If you fail, take 1 damage and 1 horror.

flavor: All the money in the world can not erase your guilt, when you remember in what sinister place the gold vein is, and the price to pay for it.
name: Gold Mining Revenues
text: Permanent. You start each new scenario with 2 additional resources. Forced - Every new scenario, at the beginning of the first round: Test [willpower](3). If you fail, take 1 direct horror.

flavor: The information that was in the Temple of Ithaqua is etched in your memory. It is very useful for understanding the mysteries around you, but it also weighs heavily on your soul.
name: Ithaqua's Knowledge
text: Permanent. [fast]: You get +3 [intellect] until the end of your turn. Test [willpower] (3): If you fail, take 1 direct horror. Forced - If you suffer a mental trauma: Exile Ithaqua's Knowledge.

name: Tomahawk
text: Fast. [action]: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for this attack. This attack deals +1 damage. [action] Discard Tomahawk: Fight. Use [agility] instead of [combat] for this attack. This attack deals +2 damage.

name: Old Injury
text: Reveleation - Put Old Injury into play in your threat area. Forced At the end of your turn: Take 1 direct damage. [action][action]: Discard Old Injury.
